text: WGWD-LP (98.3 FM) is an American non-commercial religious radio station licensed by the Federal Communications Commission to serve the community of Paintsville, Kentucky. The station license is assigned to Paintsville Church of Christ. WGWD-LP airs a Christian radio format. The station has held the WGWD-LP callsign since October 14, 2014. ==References== ==External links== * Official WGWD-LP Website * FCC Public Inspection File for WGWD-LP * GWD-LP GWD-LP Category:Radio stations established in 2015 Category:2015 establishments in Kentucky Category:Johnson County, Kentucky GWD-LP
title: WGWD-LP
